name: Nathan Chere
bio: I first got into Elixir in 2015 and haven't looked back. My day job still largely centres around .NET but Elixir is the language I remain the most passionate and excited about.

name: Norbert Melzer
bio: I found about elixir on exercism and thaught it were just another ruby, dropped it because I haven't had classes, read more about it, felt in love and cut off my relationship with ruby (nearly).

name: Fabian Zitter
bio: I started using elixir around 2016 and we have been using it in our company since 2017. I love the language for how well it translates what I want to do into code.
